item.title: Frist
item.description: hugo + github + labsworld.net brew 快速安装 hugo brew install hugo hugo new site mysite Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in /Users/hn_crypto/Desktop/working/mysite. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the same-named folder. Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/ or create your own with the "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" command. 下载一个新的模板 2. Perhaps you want to add some content. You can add single files with "hugo new <SECTIONNAME>/<FILENAME>.
